if u hav the problem with error "game not installed", do the following:
-in installation directory find file "regsetup.txt"
-keep everything the same, only change "installdir" line to look like this:
"installdir"="C:\\Konami\\PES2011\\"
-now, in win7 run "reg.exe" as admin (double-click in winxp)
-hope it helps:)
*credits for this goes to mr. Liman_Bot :)

@criptommy - it happened to me too. When the black screen appears and the circle stops rotating, press start menu button, this will minimize the game. Now you will see a window saying about bink32.dll file. Cancel or click ok. Now maximize the minimized PES 12. Now it will run.
Note : this will happen every time !.
